docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs ¶ For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands ¶ mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout ¶ mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Welcome to my personal website ¶ Currently, I am working in AGCO Randers Innovation Center as an optimisation engineer since the year 2018. I received my PhD from Aarhus University, the research group of Operations Management in 2015. My research focuses on the following topics: Operations planning: mission planning, task scheduling and allocation Field logistics: scheduling, area coverage planning, routing for machines and robots Information engineering: Identifying relevant data sources for business needs, data processing, decision optimisation Route and path planning algorithms that I developed have been applied to the following AGCO products:
docs.title: My Profile
